messages.zh: 不确定性才是世间一切的正道，信仰和同伴乃至敌人都是如此。
messages.en: Uncertainty is the right path for everything in the world. The same goes for friend and enemy.

messages.zh: 晴 。 能见度 14公里
messages.en: Sunny \ Visibility 14 km

messages.zh: 塔拉特山坑道
messages.en: Mount Talat tunnel

messages.zh: 进了这个坑道就安全了。前面出去就是莫蒂卡山，从那里开始赏金猎人的数量会明显减少。
messages.en: We'll be safe once we head inside this tunnel. Out ahead is mount Mortika, the number of bounty hunters there will be significantly reduced.

messages.zh: 至于斯卡蒂————以前听到其他人把她形容成山崩，我一直都笑得很大声。结果我今天才见识到。
messages.en: About Skadi -- I've been laughing loudly when I've heard other people describe her like a landslide before. Now that I seen it.

messages.zh: 本来以为只是一个比一般人强一点点的家伙，真没想到那些风言风语竟然不是在开玩笑。
messages.en: I always thought she was just a little better than the average guy, turn out the gossip wasn't a joke.

messages.zh: 难怪在酒吧里，我笑的时候他们都一脸惊恐地看着我。
messages.en: No wonder they looked at me in horror when I laughed in the bar.

messages.zh: 现在轮到我惊恐了，哈。
messages.en: Now it's my turn to be scared. Ha.

messages.zh: 是真的！在罗德岛的时候，大家也都是这么传来传去的啊。
messages.en: It’s true for me as well! Even in Rhodes Island, everyone says the same thing.

messages.zh: 我也没和她一起出过任务，只知道她很厉害就是了，根本没想到会变成今天这样......
messages.en: I haven’t gone on a mission with her before. I just knew she was powerful. I never thought things would turn out like this...

messages.zh: 我是头次知道她是赏金猎人。
messages.en: It's the first time I knew she was a bounty hunter.

messages.zh: 赏金猎人中的大明星之一了。
messages.en: One of the big stars among bounty hunters.

messages.zh: 这次，就连她也是冲着宝藏来的，就真的太麻烦了。
messages.en: Even she is after the treasure, it really is becoming troublesome.

messages.zh: 我们两个能不能从她嘴里抢到一成，都很难说。
messages.en: It's hard to tell if both of us can even get 10 percent cut out of her.

messages.zh: 那样的话，我的村子岂不是......
messages.en: In that case, isn't my village...

messages.zh: 别担心，我觉得她会赶走所有赏金猎人的。
messages.en: Don't worry, I think she'll chase all the bounty hunters away.

messages.zh: 顺带，再毁掉几个村子吧。
messages.en: And destroy a few more villages along the way.
*Whimper*...

messages.zh: 我觉得她并不是冲着宝藏来的，我不能让这种事发生。
messages.en: I don't think she's after the treasure. Even if she is I can't let that happen.

messages.zh: 所以，你们这个什么罗德岛，收人也是来者不拒啊？
messages.en: So, Rhodes Island accepts anyone who comes to its doorstep?

messages.zh: 没有一个罗德岛干员会为了私人的利益，去毫无顾忌地伤害别人。
messages.en: No Rhodes Island operator would do it for personal gain or hurt other people without a good reason.

messages.zh: 哼，你帮过我，谢谢你。但是你们罗德岛又养着斯卡蒂这种只懂得破坏的灾星，我看也未必真的是为感染者好。
messages.en: Hmph! While I thank you for your help. Your Rhodes Island is caring for Skadi -- a walking disaster. I don't think it's for the good of infected people.

messages.zh: 而且，我一个得了矿石病的人，也没见你们罗德岛做了啥能给我们好处的事，还不是四处被人追打。
messages.en: Besides, I'm a man with the disease, and I haven't seen your Rhodes Island doing anything good for us. We’re still being shunned by others.

messages.zh: 鲍勃大叔......
messages.en: Big Bob...

messages.zh: 怎么，哑口无言了？我是不知道你到底相信你们那个罗德岛什么地方。
messages.en: What, speechless? I don't know why you believe in Rhodes Island so much.

messages.zh: 照我看来，嘴上说着为感染者争取这个那个的，到头来，都是见钱眼开。
messages.en: It seems to me that Rhodes Island who talks about fighting for the infected, instead only cares about money in the end.

messages.zh: 哼，什么罗德岛，在这个世上，再没有比我手上这个小小金币更重要的东西！
messages.en: Hmph! What Rhodes Island, nothing in this world is more important than this little gold coin in my hand!

messages.zh: 抱歉。
messages.en: I'm sorry.

messages.zh: 抱什么歉？你还是个小孩子，弄不清理想和现实的年纪，不知道自己究竟几斤几两，这无所谓，都很正常。
messages.en: Sorry for what? You’re still a kid, it’s hard to know what’s ideal and what’s reality at your age. You still don’t know much about yourself. It’s okay. It’s normal.

messages.zh: 不，我不是要说这个。我知道自己的力量还不足。
messages.en: No, that's not what I'm trying to say. I know my strength is not enough.

messages.zh: 不管是作为骑警，还是作为罗德岛干员，我都接触过很多感染者。
messages.en: Regardless as a mounted police, or as a Rhodes Island operator, I have met many infected people.

messages.zh: ......我没能救下他们所有人，这都是我力量还不足的缘故。
messages.en: ...I still couldn't save them all because I wasn't strong enough.

messages.zh: 罗德岛也是一样的。
messages.en: The same goes for Rhodes Island.

messages.zh: 也就是没什么用？哈!
messages.en: So they are useless then, right? Ha! Ha!

messages.zh: 也是，感染者们在地下城里受苦的时候，被关进隔离城区，被人无端杀害的时候，罗德岛人在哪儿呢？
messages.en: Of course, when infected people were suffering in underground cities. Where were Rhodes Island when they were put in quarantine and killed for no reason?

messages.zh: 我也好，罗德岛也好，就算有时候拼劲全力，也总有力不能及的地方。
messages.en: I, Rhodes Island, even when we do our best, there are places where we can't reach.

messages.zh: 但就算这样，我依然不会放弃任何一位我见到的无辜感染者。
messages.en: But even so, I will not give up on any innocent infected person I meet.

messages.zh: 罗德岛，也是一样的。
messages.en: Rhodes Island, will do the same.

messages.zh: 哼。
messages.en: Hmph.

messages.zh: 抱歉......鲍勃大叔。
messages.en: I’m sorry... uncle Bob.

messages.zh: ......我说了，你还是个小孩子，我刁难你有什么用？
messages.en: I told you, you're still a kid, what's the point of me giving you a hard time?

messages.zh: 可那个斯卡蒂，你的同事，现在不惜对你刀剑相向也要抓走可萝尔夺走宝藏。
messages.en: But that Skadi, your so-called colleague, is now ready to fight you to take Carol's treasure.

messages.zh: 你肯定这种人也会相信你们拯救感染者那一套，甚至去帮你们做这种事？
messages.en: Are you sure this is the kind of person who even believes in your ideal of saving the infected, or even does it for you?

messages.zh: 我还不了解斯卡蒂究竟想做什么，所以我不能在这里下结论。
messages.en: I don't know exactly what Skadi is trying to do yet, so I can't draw conclusions here.

messages.zh: 但我相信，罗德岛接受了她，她肯定也有自己的理由才这样做的。
messages.en: But I believe in Rhodes Island's judgement, and she must have had her own reasons for doing so.

messages.zh: 我刚才话太多了，你忘了吧。
messages.en: I said too much, forget it.

messages.zh: 没关系。
messages.en: It's alright.

messages.zh: 总之当务之急，果然还是要快点帮可萝尔小姐拿到宝藏。
messages.en: Anyways, it is imperative that we help miss Carol get the treasure quickly.

messages.zh: 我伤了腿，已经是你们的累赘了。真没想到我居然要拖两个小姑娘的后腿，呿。
messages.en: My leg is hurt. I’m already a burden to you. I can't believe I'm holding two young ladies back.

messages.zh: 鲍勃大叔，只有一种情况会让你拖累我们。
messages.en: Uncle Bob, there is only one way you're holding us back.

messages.zh: 那就是你不想把宝藏给我们。
messages.en: And that is if you refuse to give us the treasure when the time comes.

messages.zh: 哼，哈哈哈哈。
messages.en: Hahaha!

messages.zh: 鲍勃先生，我没有嫌恶你的意思，只是我刚才......还是有些害怕。
messages.en: Mr Bob, I don’t think you are disgusting, it's just that I... was still a little scared.

messages.zh: 我是个乡下人，没有亲眼见过感染者，但我多少还是能看出来......你是有苦衷的人。
messages.en: I'm a countryman and have never seen an infected person with my own eyes before, but I can still tell... You’ve been through a lot.

messages.zh: 如果我之前有什么冒犯的地方，请见谅。
messages.en: If I offended you in any way before, please forgive me.

messages.zh: 没关系。哈，小姑娘，你只要在拿到宝藏后，付给我我需要的那份报酬就够了。
messages.en: It’s alright. Ha, young lady, you only have to pay my share when you get the treasure.

messages.zh: 嗯......宝藏对我们村子来说很重要。但只要能解决我们的问题，鲍勃先生是一定可以拿到应有的酬劳的。
messages.en: Right, the treasure is very important to my village. But if you can solve our problems, you will certainly get your share.

messages.zh: 所以，我和格拉尼，既需要你的协助，也会帮助你。
messages.en: That's why me and Grani need your help and we will return the favor.

messages.zh: 对吧，格拉尼？
messages.en: Right, Grani?

messages.zh: 那当然。不管怎么样，我们也该动身了。
messages.en: Of course. Anyway, it's time to leave.

messages.zh: 小姑娘，下个目标地点，差不多是莫蒂卡山了吧，那座山的名字，是某个死了不知道多少年的骑士的封号。
messages.en: Young lady, the next spot is Mount Mortika -- named after a knight that has been dead for who knows how many years.

messages.zh: 如果我没猜错，这个什么骑士宝藏，就是在那里吧？
messages.en: If I'm not mistaken, the knight's treasure is somewhere around there, right?

messages.zh: 可上面的洞窟也够找上好几个星期了。
messages.en: Yeah, there is plenty of caves up there if you go searching. It will take you weeks.

messages.zh: 那当然了。所以没有你，不行。我们可不会把你交给那个红眼女啊。
messages.en: Of course. That is if we don’t have you with us. We're not gonna hand you over to that red-eyed girl.

messages.zh: 就麻烦你带路了。
messages.en: Lead the way.

messages.zh: 就这么办。
messages.en: Let's go then.

messages.zh: 等等。
messages.en: Wait.

messages.zh: 出口有动静——
messages.en: There’s movement at the exit.
Argh-
Who... s-save... me...
It's the... infected... people...

messages.zh: .......你下手那么重？
messages.en: Did you hit him too hard?

messages.zh: 我什么都没做呀，他自己跌倒......
messages.en: I didn't do anything. He fell down by himself...

messages.zh: 啊。
messages.en: Ah.

messages.zh: 他们是......整合运动？
messages.en: They’re... Reunion Movement?

messages.zh: 你们——
messages.en: You--

messages.zh: 大鲍勃，你要干什么？
messages.en: Big Bob, what are you doing?

messages.zh: 这些家伙可不是一般的——
messages.en: These guys are no ordinary --

messages.zh: 别多说，开战！
messages.en: No more words, fight!

messages.zh: 快，快把他们全都抓起来！
messages.en: Come on everyone, let’s get them all!
